## lin\_P3\_to\_XYZ() function

Convert an array of linear-light display-p3 values to CIE XYZ using D65 (no chromatic adaptation)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function lin_P3_to_XYZ(rgb: Color): Color;
```
